title: Task force announced to help protect Toronto's economy from 'devastating impact' of virus - CTV News
description: Task force announced to help protect Toronto's economy from 'devastating impact' of virus CTV News WARREN: Joe Biden is looking for his John Tory-style comeback Toronto Sun The latest on the coronavirus: Toronto launches task force to boost local economy; Mar…
content: TORONTO Toronto Mayor John Tory has launched a special task force in response to a growing COVID outbreak that he says is having a devastating impact on the citys economy In a news release issued early Monday morning Tory said that the task force w chars
